    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Temps de stabilisation des grains sédimentaires  de différentes tailles de roche</string>
            <string language="en">Settling time of different-sized sedimentary rock grains</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vereinbarende Zeit der unterschiedlich-sortierten
sedimentären Felsenkörner</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Época estabelecindo-se de grões sedimentary 
diferente-feitas sob medida da rocha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tempo di sedimentazione dei grani sedimentari 
differente-graduati della roccia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εγκαθιστώντας χρόνος των διαφορετικός-ταξινομημένων 
ιζηματωδών σιταριών βράχου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Época que coloca de los granos sedimentarios 
diferente-clasificados de la roca</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration démontre une expérience pour  étudier et comparer le temps pris par les grains  sédimentaires tels que le gravier, le sable, la vase et l'argile pour se tasser dans l'eau.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates an experiment to investigate and compare the time it takes for  sedimentary grains such as gravel, sand, silt and clay to settle in water.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">l'argile</string>
            <string language="en">clay</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">taille de grain</string>
            <string language="en">grain size</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">gravier</string>
            <string language="en">gravel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">sable</string>
            <string language="en">sand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">roches  sédimentaires</string>
            <string language="en">sedimentary rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">temps de stabilisation</string>
            <string language="en">settling time</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">limon</string>
            <string language="en">silt</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt ein Experiment, um die 
Zeit, die es für sedimentäre Körner so als Kies, Sand, nimmt 
Feinkohle und Lehm mit Settle im Wasser nachzuforschen und zu 
vergleichen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra uma experiência para
investigar e comparar o tempo onde faça exame para grões sedimentary
tais como o cascalho, a areia, o silt e a argila ao settle na água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra un esperimento per 
studiare e confrontare il tempo che occorre per i grani sedimentari 
quale ghiaia, la sabbia, il limo e l'argilla al settle in acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει ένα πείραμα για να 
ερευνήσει και να συγκρίνει το χρόνο που παίρνει για τα ιζηματώδη 
σιτάρια όπως το αμμοχάλικο, η άμμος, ο βούρκος και ο άργιλος που
εγκαθιστούν στο ύδωρ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra un experimento para 
investigar y para comparar el tiempo que toma para los granos 
sedimentarios tales como grava, la arena, el légamo y la arcilla al 
settle en agua.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
